basic.description:
For students with three years of high school French or equivalent.
NOTE    Only offered online.  Consult Continuing and Distance Studies.
NOTE    Not available for credit towards any plan in FREN
LEARNING HOURS    144 (132O;12P)
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Communication et culture II
